price: En yakın yerde. Ancak onlar bu yenilgilerinden sonra yeneceklerdir.
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
